Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC6o.name: object
Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC6o.abstract: The object of the plugin is attached.

Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC8i.name: isActive
Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC8i.abstract: Defines whether the Object is active in the Scene.

Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC8i.name: isEnable
Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC8i.abstract: Enabled Behaviours are Updated, disabled Behaviours are not.

Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC3g.name: get(plugin:)
Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC3g.abstract: Returns the plugin of Type type if the object has one attached, null if it doesn’t.

Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC3g.name: get(plugins:)
Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC3g.abstract: Returns all plugins of Type type in the Object.

Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC5a.name: awake()
Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC5a.abstract: Awake is called when the script instance is being loaded.

Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC5s.name: start()
Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC5s.abstract: Start is called when a plugin is enabled just before any of the update function are called the first time.

Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC6u.name: update()
Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC6u.abstract: Update is called every State is update, if the Plugin is enabled.

Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC8o.name: onEnable()
Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC8o.abstract: This function is called when the object becomes enabled and active.

Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC9o.name: onDisable()
Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC9o.abstract: This function is called when the Plugin becomes disabled.

Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC9o.name: onDestroy()
Classes/Plugin.html#/s:6Jarvis6PluginC9o.abstract: This function is callled when the Plugin is deinitialized.

Classes/Object.html#/s:6Jarvis6ObjectC8i.name: isEnable
Classes/Object.html#/s:6Jarvis6ObjectC8i.abstract: Enabled Behaviours are Updated, disabled Behaviours are not.

Classes/Object.html#/s:6Jarvis6ObjectC3a.name: add(plugin:)
Classes/Object.html#/s:6Jarvis6ObjectC3a.abstract: Adds a plugin class named plugin to the object.

Classes/Object.html#/s:6Jarvis6ObjectC3g.name: get(plugin:)
Classes/Object.html#/s:6Jarvis6ObjectC3g.abstract: Returns the plugin of Type type if the object has one attached, null if it doesn’t.

Classes/Object.html#/s:6Jarvis6ObjectC3g.name: get(plugins:)
Classes/Object.html#/s:6Jarvis6ObjectC3g.abstract: Returns all plugins of Type type in the Object.

Classes/Object.html#/s:6Jarvis6ObjectC9b.name: broadcast(method:)
Classes/Object.html#/s:6Jarvis6ObjectC9b.abstract: Calls the method named method on every Plugin in this object or any of its children.

Classes/Object.html#/s:6Jarvis6ObjectC4s.name: send(method:)
Classes/Object.html#/s:6Jarvis6ObjectC4s.abstract: Calls the method named method on every Plugin in this object.
